name: Qiankun Mora Meat
desc: Ningguang's specialty. The pastry is perfectly soft and waxy, as is the consistency of the meat, and the honey-like meat juices ooze out as you squeeze it. Wherever did the high and mighty Tianquan Lady Ningguang learn to make this dish?

customize.name: Recipe: Mora Meat
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Mora Meat.

customize.name: Raw Meat
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

customize.name: Flour
customize.desc: A powder ground from wheat. No matter what it goes into, it brings a sense of satisfaction to the diner.

customize.name: Mora Meat
customize.desc: A large hunk of minced meat packaged inside a pastry. When you split the pastry in two, minced meat spills out. The taste of meat grease is all but gone, and the baking process has brought out the sweetness of the pastry. Such pastries are usually stamped with the word "Mora," all the better to represent wealth and fortune.

customize.name: Ningguang
customize.desc: The Tianquan of the Liyue Qixing. Her wealth is unsurpassed in all of Teyvat.

value.text: Revives a character and restores 10% of Max HP, then restores an additional 150 HP.
